name: Rainbow Beet Burger
preparation: In a bowl, combine first 5 ingredients. Let stand for 5 min.
Preheat frying pan over medium heat. Add oil. Scoop batter into pan, making four burgers. Lightly press and flatten into shape. Cook until golden brown, about 5-7 min per side.
Spread bottom halves of buns with dip, then add patties. Finish with toppings of choice. Cover with top bun halves.
tips: To make Lemon Dilly Dip vegan-friendly, simply omit the sour cream and use vegan yogurt.

products.name: Lemon Dilly Dip Mix
summary: Beyond being one of our most-loved kid-friendly dips – they love it for dunking chicken strips, fish bites, and veggies – Lemon Dilly is all about versatility. With loads of dill and a hint of lemon zest, it makes an utterly delicious tzatziki and spread for burgers and sandwiches, and levels up everything from salad dressing and salmon to pasta and vegetables.
